name: promenade
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a path for walking on, especially one built next to the sea: We strolled along the promenade eating ice creams.
Jose A. Bernat Bacete/Moment Open/GettyImages

Add to word list
Add to word list
a wide path for walking on, esp. one built next to a sea, lake, or river: We strolled along the promenade.
to walk slowly along a street or path, usually where you can be seen by many people, for relaxation and pleasure
